General.Name: Suzhou Nanomicro Technology Co Ltd
General.Description: Suzhou Nanomicro Technology Co., Ltd. manufactures and supplies spherical, mono-disperse particles for various industries and applications worldwide. The company products include chromatography media, solid phase extraction sorbents, particle size standards, magnetic particles, LCD spacers, ACF conductive particles, and various other micro particles. Its products portfolio also includes chromatography column, standard particles/spheres, magnetic beads, monodisperse microspheres, chromatography median, and chromatography medical. The company also exports its products to the Americas, Asia, Europe, Africa, and other markets. The company was founded in 2007 and is based in Suzhou, China.
